This project is a full-stack monorepo for CampusBuddy, a context-aware student assistant web app. Use React (TypeScript) for the frontend, Node.js (Express, TypeScript) for the backend, and integrate with Firebase, PostgreSQL, and OpenAI API. Prioritize modular, scalable, and maintainable code. Follow best practices for authentication, real-time updates, and AI/NLP integration.
